innerText: 14-1. Āsavaduka-kusalattikaṃ
1. Kusalapadaṃ
1-7. Paṭiccavārādi
Hetupaccayo

children: . Noāsavaṃ
kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 1. Noāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… kamme ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 2. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… kamme ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Sahajātavārepi…pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
2. Akusalapadaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 3. Āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 4. Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava…pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Sahajātavāropi…pe… sampayuttavāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)

children: . Āsavo akusalo dhammo āsavassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
innerText: 5. Āsavo akusalo dhammo āsavassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

children: . Hetuyā
satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādhipati labbhati)
, anantare nava…pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane
nava, kamme tīṇi…pe… jhāne tīṇi, magge nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 6. Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādhipati labbhati) , anantare nava…pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi…pe… jhāne tīṇi, magge nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
3. Abyākatapadaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Noāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 7. Noāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi…pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
innerText: 8. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi…pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
Āsavadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
15-1. Sāsavaduka-kusalattikaṃ
1. Kusalapadaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
innerText: 9. Sāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Anāsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā
dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ).
innerText: 10. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ).

children: . Naadhipatiyā dve…pe… naāsevane ekaṃ…pe… navippayutte dve (saṃkhittaṃ. Paccanīyaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha dve).
innerText: 11. Naadhipatiyā dve…pe… naāsevane ekaṃ…pe… navippayutte dve (saṃkhittaṃ. Paccanīyaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha dve).
7. Pañhāvāro
Hetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavo
kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
innerText: 12. Sāsavo kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
Anāsavo kusalo dhammo anāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā
dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve…pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 13. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve…pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2. Akusalapadaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 14. Sāsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 15. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe… avigate ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: (Sahajātavārepi
…pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
innerText: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
3. Abyākatapadaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
innerText: 16. Sāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

children: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
. Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato ca anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā . Anāsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato ca anāsavo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Sāsavaṃ abyākatañca anāsavaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca…pe… āsevane ekaṃ…pe… vipāke pañca…pe… avigate pañca (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 17. Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca…pe… āsevane ekaṃ…pe… vipāke pañca…pe… avigate pañca (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme…pe… namagge ekaṃ…pe… navippayutte dve…pe… novigate tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Sahajātavāropi…pe… sampayuttavāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
7. Pañhāvāro
Hetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavo
abyākato dhammo sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
innerText: 18. Sāsavo abyākato dhammo sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
Anāsavo abyākato dhammo anāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme…pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi…pe… avigate satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 19. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme…pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi…pe… avigate satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
Sāsavadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

Paccanīyaṃ
Nahetupaccayo

children: . Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 34. Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ).

nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi vitthāretabbā.)

Hetupaccayo

children: . Āsavo
ceva sāsavoca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 36. Āsavo ceva sāsavoca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

Paccanīyuddhāro

children: . Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo… sahajātapaccayena paccayo… upanissayapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 38. Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo… sahajātapaccayena paccayo… upanissayapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 39. Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)

Naadhipatipaccayo

children: . Āsavañceva
āsavasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.

Paccayacatukkaṃ
Hetupaccayo

children: . Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 46. Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

nava, naārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
